hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #the Bolero of Fire#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that plundering #the Deku Tree# is a foolish choice.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Haunted Wasteland# is a foolish choice.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #Spirit Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that upon the #Colossus's right and left hands# lie...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #a Map#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Double Defense#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that in #Goron City# the hammer unlocks #Magic Beans#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #a Red Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Light Trial Third Right Chest

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #the Market# is on the way of the hero.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# is on the path to #the Tower#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground MQ Eye Statue Chest

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Iron Boots#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Lost Woods# is on the path to #the Tower#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that inside #Jabu Jabu#, one can find #Jabu Jabu's Belly#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #within the Spirit Trial#, chests contain...^ #a Recovery Heart# and #a Heart Container#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Crystal Switch Chest
Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Invisible Chest

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Fire Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Iron Boots#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #the Water Temple Boss Key# can be found at #Zora's River#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that ##the Temple of Time## has #1# major item.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #an Ice Trap#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Lake Hylia# is on the path to #Twinrova#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Ice Cavern# corridors ring with #the Song of Time#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# hoards #a Bow#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #the Light Arrows#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that in the castle courtyard you can see a portrait of a young Talon.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #the Bolero of Fire#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# hoards #an Ocarina#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: Boing-oing!^There are times in life when one should seek the help of others...^Thus, when standing alone fails to help, stand together.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Double Defense#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #the Temple of Time# is on the way of the hero.

ToT (Left).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #Arrows (30 pieces)# and #Zelda's Lullaby#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #Nayru's Love#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Green Rupee#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that deep #under a vast lake#, one can find #the Gerudo Training Ground#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that the easiest way to kill Peahats is using Din's Fire while they're grounded.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #an Ice Trap#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that ##the Lost Woods## has #3# major items.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Green Rupee#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Shadow Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.
